sources.title: Haldane of the Secret Service
sources.description: Heath Haldane (Houdini) attempts to track down the vicious criminal gang responsible for his government agent father's death while also saving the girl he loves.

sources.title: Haldane of the Secret Service
sources.description: Title: Haldane of the Secret Service Summary: Heath Haldane (Houdini) tracks down a vicious gang of counterfeiters, narrowly missing death several times. He must rescue Adele Ormsby, whom he loves despite her pending marriage. Directed by: Harry Houdini Actors: Harry Houdini, Gladys Leslie, William Humphrey Production Company: Houdini Picture Corporation Release Date: 30 September 1923 (USA) Aspect Ratio: 1.33 : 1 Heath Haldane (Houdini) tracks down a vicious gang of counterfeiters, narrowly missing death several times. He must rescue Adele Ormsby, whom he loves despite her pending marriage.

metadata.Plot: Heath Haldane (Houdini) tracks down a vicious gang of counterfeiters, narrowly missing death several times. He must rescue Adele Ormsby, whom he loves despite her pending marriage.
metadata.Actors: Harry Houdini, Gladys Leslie, William Humphrey
